post.author: 황성규
post.content:
Technical Book을 50% 가까이 할인해서 파는곳인데요. Canada로는 shipping fee가 좀 많이 드네요.
http://www.bookpool.com/
강윤정 wrote: > It would be great help if someone let me know > online discount stores (like amazon.com) for technical books in *CANADA *. > > > >
post.title: Discount Technical Books - bookpool.com
